title: Bodily Harm
description: Rennie Wilford is a young journalist on a seemingly innocent assignment to the Caribbean island of St Antoine. With growing horror she is caught up in a lethal web of corruption, espionage and violence. In this small world nobody is what they seem: from the suspicious Dr Minnow (he tells her blood is news) to the burnt-out Yankee Paul (does he smuggle dope or hustle for the CIA?) who offers her what seems to be a no-hooks, no-strings affair ...
author: Margaret Atwood
